title: ProjectEX导致的问题
author: Kavintion
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Kavintion 于 2020-4-22 21:43 编辑 

RT，这个问题我认为，理解起来很简单，解决起来很棘手。




file_1587562600000.jpg (222.62 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-4-22 21:36 上传





如图，看左上角，是ProjectEX的功能，可以不按F3直接显示EMC数值。
但是估计是作者没考虑到这个问题，把下面时装工坊的F3信息也搞过来了。
玩起来非常蓝瘦，一按LCtrl显示更多，就更难受了。
我希望能够隐藏时装工坊的信息，我不希望删除其中的任何模组！
ProjectEX配置文件：

# Configuration file

general {
    # With this enabled, Power Flowers will not be affected by Watch of Flowing Time.
    B:blacklist_power_flower_from_watch=true

    # Max item that will be displayed.
    # 0 disables item exporting from links and makes refined ones useless.
    # Reduce this if you are having problems with auto-crafting or similar things.
    I:emc_link_max_out=2000000000

    # The whitelist for Stone Table will be ignored unless this is set to true.
    B:enable_stone_table_whitelist=false

    # If set to false, it will only copy items with EMC value.
    B:final_star_copy_any_item=true

    # If set to false, it will remove item NBT.
    B:final_star_copy_nbt=false

    # Set to 0 to completely disable itemc copying.
    # Min: 0
    # Max: 2147483647
    I:final_star_update_interval=20

    # Overrides default EMC formatter from ProjectE with custom one.
    B:override_emc_formatter=true
    S:stone_table_whitelist <
        oredict:ingot
        oredict:gem
        oredict:dust
        oredict:nugget
        oredict:block
        oredict:ore
        oredict:stone

        oredict:blockGlassColorless
        oredict:enderpearl
        minecraft:blaze_rod
        minecraft:ghast_tear
     >
}


items {

    B:clay_matter=false

    B:tome=true
}

时装工坊配置文件
client.cfg

# Configuration file

~CONFIG_VERSION: 1

##########################################################################################################
# cache
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# Change (memory use/IO access) ratio by category setting in this category.
##########################################################################################################

cache {
    # Maximum number of skin the client can request at one time. [range: 1 ~ 50, default: 10]
    I:maxSkinRequests=10

    # How long in seconds the client will keep model parts in it's cache.
    # Default 600 seconds is 10 minutes.
    # Setting to 0 turns off this option. [range: 0 ~ 3600, default: 600]
    I:modelPartCacheExpireTime=600

    # Max size the cache can reach before model parts are removed.
    # Setting to 0 turns off this option. [range: 0 ~ 10000, default: 2000]
    I:modelPartCacheMaxSize=2000

    # How long in seconds the client will keep skins in it's cache.
    # Default 600 seconds is 10 minutes.
    # Setting to 0 turns off this option. [range: 0 ~ 3600, default: 600]
    I:skinCacheExpireTime=600

    # Max size the skin cache can reach before skins are removed.
    # Setting to 0 turns off this option. [range: 0 ~ 10000, default: 2000]
    I:skinCacheMaxSize=2000

    # How long in seconds the client will keep textures in it's cache.
    # Default 600 seconds is 10 minutes.
    # Setting to 0 turns off this option. [range: 0 ~ 3600, default: 600]
    I:textureCacheExpireTime=600

    # Max size the texture cache can reach before textures are removed.
    # Setting to 0 turns off this option. [range: 0 ~ 5000, default: 1000]
    I:textureCacheMaxSize=1000
}


##########################################################################################################
# debug
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# Debug settings.
##########################################################################################################

debug {
    # Shows extra info on the F3 debug screen.
    B:showF3DebugInfo=true

    # Shows extra debug info on skin tooltips.
    B:showSkinTooltipDebugInfo=false

    # Texture painting replacing the players texture with a painted version.
    # Turning this off may fix issues with the players texture rendering
    # incorrectly or showing the steve skin.
    # 
    # -1 = disabled
    # 0 = auto
    # 1 = texture_replace (replaces the players texture - LEGACY)
    # 2 = model_replace_mc (render using a mc model - slower, more compatible - NOT IMPLEMENTED)
    # 3 = model_replace_aw (render using a aw model - faster, less compatible)
    #  [range: -1 ~ 2, default: 0]
    I:texturePaintingType=0
}


##########################################################################################################
# misc
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# Miscellaneous settings.
##########################################################################################################

misc {
    # How long skins will display their loading animation for in milliseconds
    # Settings this to 0 will disable loading animations. [range: 0 ~ 10000, default: 200]
    I:skinLoadAnimationTime=200
}


##########################################################################################################
# performance
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# Change (visual quality/performance) ratio by category setting in this category.
##########################################################################################################

performance {
    # Distance away that skins will have lod applied to them. [range: 8.0 ~ 128.0, default: 32.0]
    S:lodDistance=32.0

    # Number of LOD models to create. Higher number should give a boost to framerate at a small cost to VRAM. [range: 0 ~ 4, default: 4]
    I:maxLodLevels=4

    # The maximum number of threads that will be used to bake models. [range: 1 ~ 16, default: core count / 2]
    I:modelBakingThreadCount=6

    # How fast models are allowed to bake. Lower values will give smoother frame rate but models will load slower.
    # Has no effect if 'slowModelBaking' is turned off. [range: 10 ~ 1000, default: 40]
    I:modelBakingUpdateRate=40

    # When enabled skin will render in multiple passes to reduce visual artifacts.
    # Disabling this will improve skin rendering performance at the cost of visual quality. [default: true]
    B:multipassSkinRendering=true

    # The max distance in blocks that block skins will be rendered. [range: 16 ~ 512, default: 128]
    I:renderDistanceBlockSkin=128

    # The max distance in blocks that equipment will be rendered on mannequins. [range: 16 ~ 512, default: 64]
    I:renderDistanceMannequinEquipment=64

    # The max distance in blocks that skins will render. [range: 16 ~ 512, default: 128]
    I:renderDistanceSkin=128

    # Limits how fast models can be baked to provide a smoother frame rate. [default: true]
    B:slowModelBaking=true

    # Use classic block models instead of the 3D model versions. [default: false]
    B:useClassicBlockModels=false
}


##########################################################################################################
# skin-preview
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# Setting to configure the skin preview box.
##########################################################################################################

skin-preview {
    # Draw a background box for the skin preview. [default: true]
    B:skinPreDrawBackground=true

    # Enables a larger skin preview box when hovering the mouse over a skin. [default: true]
    B:skinPreEnabled=true

    # Skin preview will be rendered next to the mouse. [default: true]
    B:skinPreLocFollowMouse=true

    # Horizontal location of the skin preview: 0 = left, 1 = right. [range: 0.0 ~ 1.0, default: 0.0]
    S:skinPreLocHorizontal=0.0

    # Vertical location of the skin preview: 0 = top, 1 = bottom. [range: 0.0 ~ 1.0, default: 0.5]
    S:skinPreLocVertical=0.5

    # Size of the skin preview. [range: 16.0 ~ 256.0, default: 96.0]
    S:skinPreSize=96.0
}


复制代码


common.cfg

# Configuration file

~CONFIG_VERSION: 1

##########################################################################################################
# cache
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# Change (memory use/IO access) ratio by category setting in this category.
##########################################################################################################

cache {
    # How long in seconds the server will keep skins in it's cache.
    # Default 600 seconds is 10 minutes.
    # Setting to 0 turns off this option. [range: 0 ~ 3600, default: 6000]
    I:skinCacheExpireTime=6000

    # Max size the skin cache can reach before skins are removed.
    # Setting to 0 turns off this option. [range: 0 ~ 10000, default: 2000]
    I:skinCacheMaxSize=2000
}


##########################################################################################################
# entity-skins
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# Control how/if entities spawm with skin on them.
##########################################################################################################

entity-skins {
    # Target library path for skin spawned on entities.
    # Examples: 'official/' for only skins in the official folder or 'downloads/' for skins in the downloads folder.
    # Leave black for all skins. [default: ]
    S:enitiySpawnSkinTargetPath=

    # Percentage change that entities will spawn with skins equipped. [range: 0 ~ 100, default: 0]
    I:enitiySpawnWithSkinsChance=0

    # Percentage change that entities will drop equipped skins when killed. [range: 0 ~ 100, default: 0]
    I:entityDropSkinChance=0
}


##########################################################################################################
# general
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# General settings.
##########################################################################################################

general {
    # If true the dye table will be instanced for each player. Items will be dropped when the table is closed. [default: false]
    B:instancedDyeTable=false

    # Used by the mod to check if it has been updated. [default: 0.0]
    S:lastVersion=1.12.2-0.49.1

    # When enabled players will not be able to remove dyes from skins in the dye table. [default: false]
    B:lockDyesOnSkins=false

    # Max number of undos a player has for block painting. [range: 0 ~ 1000, default: 100]
    I:maxUndos=100

    # If enabled the server will compress skins before sending them to clients.
    # Highly recommended unless the server has a very slow CPU. [default: true]
    B:serverCompressesSkins=true

    # The maximum number of skins the server is allow to send every minute.
    # Less that 1 equals unlimited. (not recommended may cause bandwidth and cpu spikes on the server) [range: 0 ~ 8000, default: 4000]
    I:serverModelSendRate=4000
}


##########################################################################################################
# holiday-events
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# Enable/disable holiday events.
##########################################################################################################

holiday-events {
    # Setting to true will disable all holiday events. What's wrong with you! [default: false]
    B:disableAllHolidayEvents=false

    # Enable holiday. [default: true]
    B:holiday-april-fools-enabled=true

    # Holiday date range. Format (Start Date-End Date) (MONTH:DAY:HOUR-MONTH:DAY:HOUR) [default: 04:01:00-04:02:00]
    S:holiday-april-fools-range=04:01:00-04:02:00

    # Enable holiday. [default: true]
    B:holiday-christmas-enabled=true

    # Holiday date range. Format (Start Date-End Date) (MONTH:DAY:HOUR-MONTH:DAY:HOUR) [default: 12:25:00-12:26:00]
    S:holiday-christmas-range=12:25:00-12:26:00

    # Enable holiday. [default: true]
    B:holiday-christmas-season-enabled=true

    # Holiday date range. Format (Start Date-End Date) (MONTH:DAY:HOUR-MONTH:DAY:HOUR) [default: 12:01:00-01:01:00]
    S:holiday-christmas-season-range=12:01:00-01:01:00

    # Enable holiday. [default: true]
    B:holiday-halloween-enabled=true

    # Holiday date range. Format (Start Date-End Date) (MONTH:DAY:HOUR-MONTH:DAY:HOUR) [default: 10:31:00-11:01:00]
    S:holiday-halloween-range=10:31:00-11:01:00

    # Enable holiday. [default: true]
    B:holiday-halloween-season-enabled=true

    # Holiday date range. Format (Start Date-End Date) (MONTH:DAY:HOUR-MONTH:DAY:HOUR) [default: 10:24:00-11:01:00]
    S:holiday-halloween-season-range=10:24:00-11:01:00

    # Enable holiday. [default: true]
    B:holiday-new-years-enabled=true

    # Holiday date range. Format (Start Date-End Date) (MONTH:DAY:HOUR-MONTH:DAY:HOUR) [default: 01:01:00-01:02:00]
    S:holiday-new-years-range=01:01:00-01:02:00

    # Enable holiday. [default: true]
    B:holiday-ponytail-day-enabled=true

    # Holiday date range. Format (Start Date-End Date) (MONTH:DAY:HOUR-MONTH:DAY:HOUR) [default: 07:07:00-07:08:00]
    S:holiday-ponytail-day-range=07:07:00-07:08:00

    # Enable holiday. [default: true]
    B:holiday-valentines-enabled=true

    # Holiday date range. Format (Start Date-End Date) (MONTH:DAY:HOUR-MONTH:DAY:HOUR) [default: 02:14:00-02:15:00]
    S:holiday-valentines-range=02:14:00-02:15:00
}


##########################################################################################################
# library
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# Setting for the library blocks.
##########################################################################################################

library {
    # Allows clients to save skins from a server to their local computer using the library. [default: false]
    B:allowDownloadingSkins=false

    # Allows clients to load skins from their local computer onto the server using the library. [default: true]
    B:allowUploadingSkins=true

    # Allow the mod to extract the official skins that come with the mod into the library folder. [default: true]
    B:extractOfficialSkins=true

    # Shows model previews in the library.
    # Causes a lot of extra load on servers.
    # Best to turn off on high population servers [default: true]
    B:libraryShowsModelPreviews=true
}


##########################################################################################################
# recipe
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# Setting for mod recipes.
##########################################################################################################

recipe {
    # Disable hidden in world doll recipe. [default: false]
    B:disableDollRecipe=false

    # Disable vanilla recipes. Use if you want to manually add recipes for a mod pack. [default: false]
    B:disableRecipes=false

    # Disable skinning table recipes. [default: false]
    B:disableSkinningRecipes=false

    # Enable copying the skin off an item in the skinning table [default: false]
    B:enableRecoveringSkins=false

    # Hides the doll block from the creative tab and NEI. [default: true]
    B:hideDollFromCreativeTabs=true
}


##########################################################################################################
# wardrobe
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# Setting for the players wardrobe.
##########################################################################################################

wardrobe {
    # Allow the player to open the wardrobe GUI. [default: true]
    B:wardrobeAllowOpening=true

    # Should skins be dropped on player death.
    # 0 = use keep inventory rule
    # 1 = never drop
    # 2 = always drop [range: 0 ~ 2, default: 0]
    I:wardrobeDropSkinsOnDeath=0

    # Number of slot columns the player starts with for skins. [range: 1 ~ 8, default: 3]
    I:wardrobeStartingSlots=3

    # Enable the wardrobe colour settings tab. [default: true]
    B:wardrobeTabColourSettings=true

    # Enable the wardrobe display settings tab. [default: true]
    B:wardrobeTabDisplaySettings=true

    # Enable the wardrobe dyes tab. [default: true]
    B:wardrobeTabDyes=true

    # Enable the wardrobe outfits tab. [default: true]
    B:wardrobeTabOutfits=true

    # Enable the wardrobe skins tab. [default: true]
    B:wardrobeTabSkins=true
}


复制代码


overrides

# Configuration file

~CONFIG_VERSION: 1

##########################################################################################################
# compatibility
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# Allows auto item skinning for supported mod to be enable/disable.
##########################################################################################################

compatibility {
    # Enable auto item support for Minecraft. [default: true]
    B:enable-minecraft-compat=true
}


##########################################################################################################
# overrides
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# Custom list of items that can be skinned.
# Format [override type:mod id:item name]
# Valid override types are: sword, shield, bow, pickaxe, axe, shovel, hoe and item
# example sword:minecraft:iron_sword
##########################################################################################################

overrides {
    S:itemOverrides <
     >
}


复制代码
